alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 09 at 3:10AM HST until December 10 at 4:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU AND KAUAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF OAHU MOLOKAI AND MAUI... .A northwest (320 degrees) swell will peak today, then gradually subside and become increasingly northerly tonight and Sunday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM HST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Surf 12 to 16 feet along north facing shores, and 8 to 12 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau and Kauai, and north facing shores of Oahu, Molokai and Maui. * WHEN...Until 4 AM HST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Windward Haleakala
